summary: Completed frontend testing of Help Center feature. All 10 features tested successfully: Help Center page loads at /help, 8 articles displayed organized by 5 categories (Basics, Data Sources, Visualization, Analysis, Export), search functionality filters articles correctly, category filter buttons work, article detail view shows parsed markdown content with SVG placeholder images, headings, bold text, and lists rendering correctly, Back to Help Center button works, Help Center link appears in Settings sidebar.

issues: SVG placeholder images show 'Screenshot placeholder - navigate to X to view' text. These are working as designed per implementation.

frontend: Help Center page loads at /help with data-testid='help-center-page'
Help Center shows 8 article cards organized by 5 categories
Category filter buttons work - All(8), Basics(1), Data Sources(2), Visualization(2), Analysis(2), Export(1)
Clicking article card opens article detail view with data-testid='help-article-view'
Article detail view shows parsed markdown content
Images render using markdown image syntax (2 images in Getting Started article)
Bold text, H1, H2 headings, and lists render correctly
Back to Help Center button works and returns to main view
Help Center link appears in Settings sidebar navigation

seed_data_available: 8 Help Center articles: Getting Started, Chart Studio, Database Connections, AI Insights, Dashboard Builder, Drill-Down, PDF Export, Upload Data
context_for_next_testing_agent: Help Center feature fully implemented and tested. Markdown parser correctly converts: images ![alt](/path), headers (#, ##, ###), bold (**text**), italic (*text*), inline code (`code`), bullet lists (- item), numbered lists. SVG placeholder images in /public/images/docs/ render correctly. Search filters by title, description, and content. Categories: Basics, Data Sources, Visualization, Analysis, Export.
